Issue.creator: sambhavdutt
Issue.summary: The fabric-chaincode-java-merge jobs fail during the gradle build.
Issue.description: Could not build image: The command '/bin/bash -c source /root/.sdkman/bin/sdkman-init.sh; gradle build shadowJar' returned a non-zero code: 1 {code} {code:java} 13:49:53 FAILURE: Build failed with an exception. 13:49:53 13:49:53 * What went wrong: 13:49:53 Execution failed for task ':fabric-chaincode-docker:buildImage'. 13:49:53 > Could not build image: The command '/bin/bash -c source /root/.sdkman/bin/sdkman-init.sh; sdk install gradle 4.6' returned a non-zero code: 1 {code} *Build Log* https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/view/fabric-chaincode-java/job/fabric-chaincode-java-merge-master-x86_64/4/consoleFull https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/view/fabric-chaincode-java/job/fabric-chaincode-java-merge-master-x86_64/5/console >
